stimulusHtml: Which of the following methods can be added to  SomeClass  to allow other classes to modify the value of  myA?

features.html:
Consider the following partial class definition.

 

public class SomeClass
{
   private int myA;

   // Constructor(s) not shown
   
   public int getA()
   {
      return myA;
   }
}

choicesHtml:
public void setA(int newA)
{
   myA = newA;
}

private void setA(int newA)
{
   myA = newA;
}

public void setA(int newA)
{
   newA = myA;
}

private void setA(int newA)
{
   newA = myA;
}
